entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
